## Overview

Stats and R is a comprehensive blog by Antoine Soetewey that provides tutorials, guides, and articles on statistics and R programming. It covers fundamental statistical concepts, practical R implementations, and real-world data analysis examples.

## Key Features

- **Free Tutorials**: Accessible guides on statistics and R
- **Practical Examples**: Real data analysis with reproducible code
- **Statistical Theory**: Clear explanations of statistical concepts
- **R Code**: Working examples for common analyses
- **Visualization**: Guides for creating effective data visualizations
- **Regular Updates**: Continuously updated with new content

## Use Cases in Research

- Learning fundamental statistical concepts
- Understanding when to use different statistical tests
- Implementing statistical analyses in R
- Creating effective data visualizations
- Troubleshooting common R programming issues
- Teaching statistics to students and colleagues

## Getting Started

Visit [statsandr.com](https://www.statsandr.com) to browse articles and tutorials on statistics and R programming.
